title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Searching for references to this field5.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: The first match should be selected when double-clicking on a search result.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Perform a search for references to this field5.
2. Double-click on the search result.
3. Observe that the first match is not selected.
